Alan,

Robert Haynes showed me (by drawing out on paper)the different kanji=
 
for 'Suke' that this smith used. It's very hard to see on the tsuba. 
I w=
ill attempt a better photo. This description may help; the legs 
of the kan=
ji (suke) are spread apart at the top (like a vee). I have 
the little post=
-it that Robert drew the kanji on. 

Let me work on this. I appreciate your=
 help.

Elliott
